coreAttributes.clothingAuthorTag: A tag discreetly sewn into the dress's inner lining informs you that it was made by 'Serpentia Silk&Satin Ltd.'.
coreAttributes.name: asymmetrical dress
coreAttributes.description: A heavily asymmetrical dress that covers the wearer's left from shoulder to ankle but exposes nearly their entire right, save for the midriff.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the sash, before pulling [npc.her] asymmetrical dress off over [npc.her] head.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the sash, before pulling [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress off over [npc2.her] head.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(untie)] the sash, before roughly pulling [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress off over [npc2.her] head.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the asymmetrical dress down over [npc.her] head and torso, then [npc.verb(tie)] the sash around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] the asymmetrical dress down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(tie)] the sash around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] the asymmetrical dress down over [npc2.namePos] head and torso, then [npc.verb(tie)] the sash around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc.her] asymmetrical dress.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] up the skirt of [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc.her] asymmetrical dress.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down the skirt of [npc2.namePos] asymmetrical dress.
